channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dow up over 500 points in final hour, S&P 500 aims for record close — live
The dollar’s decline this year is unlike its large selloff in 2025
House hardliners complicate ending government shutdown as Speaker Johnson moves ahead
item.description: The U.S. government partially shut down Saturday morning after Congress failed to pass legislation to keep it funded.

item.title: Trump pardon attorney Ed Martin reportedly sidelined from investigations
item.description: Martin's role at DOJ was narrowed following a protracted feud with Deputy Attorney General Todd Blanche, sources told MS NOW.

item.title: Palantir’s stock surges as AI demand drives another record quarter
Silver plunges into bear market for the first time since 2022. What comes next?
Dow ends over 500 points higher, S&P 500 just shy of record as U.S. stocks climb
Trump says U.S. and India reached trade deal, will lower tariffs immediately
item.description: The U.S. and India have reached a trade deal to lower tariffs, President Donald Trump announced.

item.title: Speaker Johnson: 'Confident' government shutdown will end by Tuesday
item.description: The government shut down on Saturday after Senate Democrats demanded changes to a spending package following the killings of U.S. citizens in Minnesot...

item.title: United Arab Emirates' 'Spy Sheikh' bought secret stake in Trump crypto company: WSJ
item.description: “This is corruption, plain and simple," said Massachusetts Sen. Elizabeth Warren, the top Democrat on the Senate Banking Committee.
